person.content:

| an anonymous citizen |
| Department of Corrections spokesman Eugene Morris |

In this paragraph, the "Person" entities are "Mills", "an anonymous citizen", and "Department of Corrections spokesman Eugene Morris". The other possible entity, "Department of Corrections", is not a person, so it should not be included in the table.
